title: How do I backup and restore contacts?
answer:
Touch Tools > Backup. 

l Backup

Touch Backup > Back up to SD card. Select contacts and then touch BACK UP. Set password and back up the contacts.

[![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/1dabf_isoni.png)](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/1dabf_isoni.png) [![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/1dac0_tpxst.png)](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/1dac0_tpxst.png) [![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/1dac1_ozxtx.png)](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/1dac1_ozxtx.png)

l Restore

[[Touch Backup > Restore from SD card. Select the backup file and enter the password. Select contacts and touch Restore.]()]()
